app_description: OpenSea is the first and largest peer-to-peer marketplace for crypto collectibles, which include gaming items, digital art, and other virtual goods backed by a blockchain.
Coinbase is a secure online platform for buying, selling, transferring, and storing cryptocurrency.
Aave Protocol is a non-custodial liquidity protocol. Users can participate as suppliers, borrowers, or liquidators, earning interest on supplied assets and borrowing in an overcollateralized manner.

Payments and Onboarding Infrastructure for Web3 dApps, companies:

On-Ramps: Global fiat to crypto onboarding and payment solution
Off-Ramps: Global crypto to fiat offboarding and payment solution
NFT Checkout: Global fiat to NFT checkout solution
Transak One: Global fiat to smart contract onboarding and purchase solution

All the above products abstract away the complexity of user KYC, risk monitoring & compliance, payment methods and customer support. H
